sentence.Network_en: There's no need to be so goddam rude!
Let the first bastards to find out be the goddam Germans.
sentence.Network_cn: 就让那些混账的德国佬去做最先发现的倒霉鬼吧.

sentence.Network_en: She's giving him the some goddam line she handed you.
sentence.Network_cn: 她当初对你花言巧语,现在对他也照样如此.

PerfectNetExp.abs: godchild 教子goddam 诅咒的goddamn 诅咒的
Woodrow , I think you're pretty goddam mean .伍德罗，我说你也太没良心了。
" All I did was touch the goddam brakes , " the driver protested loudly ., " 我就是踩了那倒霉的刹车 , " 司机高声申辩道.
You won ' t get goddam thing !, 你不会有那个该死的东西的!

list.abs: Marx , here is a good man - a goddam hero ., 这位马克思是个了不起的人 -- 一个了不起的英雄.
You won ' t get goddam thing !, 你不会有那个该死的东西的!
They ' re building goddam yacht harbor ., 他们要修建一座巨大的游艇码头.
Woodrow , I think you're pretty goddam mean .伍德罗，我说你也太没良心了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: abbreviation of God damn (me)

entry.tran: （表示愤怒、吃惊或激动，可能具冒犯意味）该死的，要命的
entry.def: Some people use goddamn when they are angry, surprised, or excited. This use could cause offence.

sentences.sentence: "I'll be damned (or blessed or darned or goddamned) if I'll do any such thing"
"he's a damn (or goddam or goddamned) fool"

auth_sentence.content: She would be the goddam Jane Goodall of skunk-ape studies.
auth_sentence.res_content: She would be the goddam Jane Goodall of skunk-ape studies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She would be the goddam Jane Goodall of skunk-ape studies.

auth_sentence.content: "I married a goddam musician," she says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I married a goddam musician," she says.

auth_sentence.content: Me barging in there like it was a goddam five-'n'-dime .
auth_sentence.res_content: Me barging in there like it was a goddam five-'n'-dime .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Me barging in there like it was a goddam five-'n'-dime .
